articles.author: Eleanor Clift
articles.title: Trump’s Brain Drain at NASA Leaves the Agency Spaced Out - The Daily Beast
articles.description: At stake is the broader issue of trust in science—and America’s place in the cosmos.
articles.content: The budget-cutters called astrophysicist Dr. Kartik Sheth and his colleagues in the chief scientists suite at NASA low-hanging fruit, which meant they were among the first to lose their jobs after Pr… [+5231 chars]
